name: Lumos
description: Makes the tip of the wand shine with light.

name: Nox
description: Extinguishes the light produced by Lumos.

name: Lumos Solem
description: Produces an intense light simulating sunlight.

name: Obliviate
description: Erases specific memories from a person's mind.

name: Reparo
sensation: A harmonious vibration hums in your hand, guiding scattered pieces toward wholeness.

name: Protego
description: Creates a magical shield to block attacks.

name: Expecto Patronum
description: Conjures a Patronus to repel Dementors.

name: Rennervate
description: Revives a stunned or unconscious person.

name: Petrificus Totalus
sensation: A rigid, stone-like tension locks into your fingers, as if your own body were momentarily freezing from within.

name: Stupefy
sensation: A sharp burst of red-hot force surges through your arm, eager to erupt in a stunning shockwave.

name: Rictusempra
description: Makes the target laugh uncontrollably and weakens them.
sensation: A light, tickling spark dances across your fingertips, playful yet strangely destabilizing.

name: Incendio
sensation: A warm, hungry heat coils in your palm, flickering like a flame waiting to be unleashed.

name: Crucio
description: Inflicts unbearable pain on the target.
sensation: A chilling, venomous pulse crawls up your arm, radiating a cruel intensity that makes the air itself feel hostile.

name: Imperio
description: Controls the actions of the target.
sensation: A smooth, silvery calm floods your mind and hand, disturbingly serene, as if your will were stretching outward to claim another.

name: Diffindo
sensation: A razor-thin line of focused energy sharpens at your fingertips, precise enough to slice through the air itself.

name: Confringo
sensation: A volatile pressure swells in your hand, trembling with explosive potential barely held in check.

name: Incarcerous
description: Conjures ropes to bind a target.
sensation: A twisting, rope-like force coils around your wrist, ready to spring forward and bind whatever stands before you.
